hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:I saw in a dream a piece of silken cloth in my hand, and in whatever direction in Paradise I waved it, it flew, carrying me there. I narrated this (dream) to (my sister) Hafsa and she told it to the Prophet (ﷺ) who said, (to Hafsa), "Indeed, your brother is a righteous man," or, "Indeed, `Abdullah is a righteous man

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِسْتَبْرَقِ وَدُخُولِ الْجَنَّةِ فِي الْمَنَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Al-Istabraq and entering Paradise (in a dream)
